casebody.data:
B & B PARTNERSHIP and B & B Piscataway, Inc., Plaintiffs-Appellants, and BEVARD FAMILY LIMITED PARTNERSHIP, Plaintiff, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant-Appellee. No. 03-5028. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. July 11, 2003.

Before LOURIE, RADER, and SCHALL, Circuit Judges.

JUDGMENT

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
